amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC 543. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to fund any Experimental Program to Stimulate Competitive Research (EPSCoR) program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to fund any Experimental Program to Stimulate Competitive Research (EPSCoR) program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 232 (Roll no. 279).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 232 (Roll no. 279).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Foster.
